== Event suggestions ==

If you have suggestions or wishlist items that you would like to see incorporated into our <nowiki>[[UDS-EventHowTo]]</nowiki> documentation for future events please add them here instead of modifying the documentation directly.

Please use @``SIG@ to sign your request or leave contact information such as your <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/|Launchpad]]</nowiki> username so we can get in contact with you to request additional information or assistance.

=== Example suggestion ===

There aren't enough ponies at UDS! It's quite boring to have to walk from session to session and it would be much more fun if we had ponies to ride. -- <nowiki>[[LaunchpadHome:sciri]]</nowiki>
